sentence.Network_en: When the trains crashed into each other, the cars were telescoped.
sentence.Network_cn: 那两辆火车相撞时, 车厢挤在一起了.

sentence.Network_en: As a result of the collision, the first two cars telescoped.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于相撞, 头两节车厢叠嵌在一起了.

sentence.Network_en: The rules of good cooking cannot be telescoped into a single sentence.
sentence.Network_cn: 精美的烹调规则不能缩短为一单独句子.
